TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpStatus extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Constants enumerating the HTTP status codes.

remarks.para:
Constants enumerating the HTTP status codes. All status codes defined in RFC1945 (HTTP/1.0), RFC2616 (HTTP/1.1), and RFC2518 (WebDAV) are listed.
See Also
Static constant for a 419 error. 419 Insufficient Space on Resource (WebDAV - draft-ietf-webdav-protocol-05?) or 419 Proxy Reauthentication Required (HTTP/1.1 drafts?)
Static constant for a 420 error. 420 Method Failure (WebDAV - draft-ietf-webdav-protocol-05?)

Docs.summary: 207 Multi-Status (WebDAV - RFC 2518) or 207 Partial Update OK (HTTP/1.1 - draft-ietf-http-v11-spec-rev-01?)

remarks.para: 207 Multi-Status (WebDAV - RFC 2518) or 207 Partial Update OK (HTTP/1.1 - draft-ietf-http-v11-spec-rev-01?)
